00028 #ifndef PROCESSSPECIFICARCHIVE_HPP_
00029 #define PROCESSSPECIFICARCHIVE_HPP_
00030 
00031 #include <string>
00032 #include <sstream>
00033 #include <cassert>
00034 #include <iostream>
00035 
00036 #include "Exception.hpp"
00037 #include "PetscTools.hpp"
00038 
00060 template <class Archive>
00061 class ProcessSpecificArchive
00062 {
00063 private:
00065     static Archive* mpArchive;
00066 
00067 public:
00069     static Archive* Get(void)
00070     {
00071         if (mpArchive == NULL)
00072         {
00073             EXCEPTION("A ProcessSpecificArchive has not been set up.");
00074         }
00075         return mpArchive;
00076     }
00077 
00083     static void Set(Archive* pArchive)
00084     {
00085         mpArchive = pArchive;
00086     }
00087 };
00088 
00089 #endif /*PROCESSSPECIFICARCHIVE_HPP_*/
